# Change Log

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.
This project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](http://semver.org/).

# v1.0.0 2017-02-23

* Releasing as v1.0.0 for better semver compatibility.

# v0.0.4 2016-12-19

### Added

* Added support for block-level metadata (added in draft-js@0.8.0) â€” Thanks to [@corbanbrook](https://github.com/icelab/draft-js-ast-exporter/pull/5)!

# v0.0.3 2016-08-26

### Fixed

* Fix `depth` handling.

# v0.0.2 2016-06-16

### Added

* Allow entity data to be modified on export through `options.entityModifiers` functions.

# v0.0.1 2016-05-17

First public release
